survey.description: First inventory of the Kingdom of Archenland (1015-1020)

entity.name: time_study
entity.label: Time study
entity.description: Date, start time and end time of visit to the cluster.

pattern.message: Subplot letter must be a single letter (A-Z)
Must correspond to colour codes indicated in Munsell Soil Colour Book in the form hue/value/chroma.

entity.name: shrubs
entity.label: Shrub
Shrubs
entity.description: Inside the plot (within 15 m of plot centre)

number.name: count
number.label: Count
number.description: Number of seedlings and saplings >10cm tall and with DBH<1cm

number.name: dbh
number.label: DBH (cm)
number.description: Diameter at the breast height (1.3 m) measured above bark

check.message: Unusual relationship between DBH and total height.
Unusual relationship between dbh and total height.

number.name: approx_year
number.label: Years ago
number.description: Number of years ago when tree was felled. If year is missing, it is assumed that the tree well felled more than three years ago.

check.message: Male and female gender compositions should add up to 100%

number.name: head_years_at_location
number.label: Head of household years at location
